text: Shelby Charter Township, officially the Charter Township of Shelby, is a charter township and census-designated place located in Macomb County in the U.S. state of Michigan. It is a suburb of Detroit. As of the 2020 census, the township had a total population of 79,408. Shelby Charter Township is one of the fastest growing communities in Metro Detroit. ==References== Category:Charter townships in Michigan
title: Shelby Charter Township, Michigan
